name: RL (itch)
description:
RL has a Dungeon. a dungeon with a heart. A big red vicious decaying heart.

RL has a hero. a brave manly unarmed hero.

RL has monsters. ghostly and bony. prepare to Die. A lot.

Time your movements right, sneak past monster after monster and delve as deep as you dare.

RL is a game by TDOS, with music by Role.

Its opensource and free.

RL was made for Ludum Dare 32. check it out!

RL source requires GameMaker-Studio.
